articles.title: Your Knees Might Be Aging Faster Than You Think - SciTechDaily
articles.description: MRI scans show early knee joint damage is common in symptom-free adults in their thirties. Mild structural changes in the knees are showing up on MRI scans in adults as young as their early thirties—even in people who have no knee pain or symptoms at all. In …
articles.content:
New research reveals that even seemingly healthy adults in their thirties may already exhibit early signs of knee joint damage.
